scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace @vizij/animation-react && npm run build --workspace @vizij/node-graph-react && npm run build --workspace @vizij/config && npm run build --workspace @vizij/rig
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace vizij-website && npm run build --workspace vizij-node-graph-editor && npm run build --workspace demo-animation-studio && npm run build --workspace demo-animation && npm run build --workspace demo-graph

scripts.build:graph: npm run build --workspace @vizij/node-graph-react && npm run build --workspace vizij-node-graph-editor
